app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps UverVideo Video Editor Maker
app_description: The video project is automatically saved in real time so you are not afraid of losing your progress! Can be edited anytime anywhere! Whether you are a novice or a professional you can use UverVideo s powerful video editing functions to create the video content you want more quickly and easily and edit creative life easily! Features: Video Editor Movie Maker. Live photos Live photos dynamic video and still photos with one click switch. Slideshow maker Splice multiple photos to make a video slideshow. Picture in Picture Supports adding multiple material layers and adjusting the layer level. Blending mode Multi layer mixed exposure to create stunning visual effects. 4K quality Support 4K pixel video material editing and export. Music sound effects Hundreds of music sound effects to meet the needs of a variety of scenes. Audio separation Easily extract music from the entire network video. Art text Powerful typesetting and editing functions hundreds of style templates. Video split screen Supports horizontal and vertical 2 3 4 6 9 grids. Video reverse playback One click reverse playback making special effects videos. Video speed change 0.2 100 times free speed change. Video Split To accurately split the video in a single frame to split any part of the video at will. Video Trim To flexibly trim the beginning and end of the video and the middle part. Video Stitching Multi material stitching into a complete video the order can be changed. Video ratio Support more than ten kinds of canvas ratios to edit video. Video rotation Can flexibly rotate the video and flip up and down left and right. Video freeze Capture video frames to pictures. Professional filters A variety of film level professional style filters. Advanced transition One click get high end transition effects. Stunning animation Cool dynamic animation effects. Fun background Support adding colors patterns blurs and other backgrounds. Texture effect Various mosaic effects such as crystal raindrops frosted glass etc. Creative stickers A variety of creative stickers to add interest to the video. Unrestrained zoom You can zoom in and out the video picture at will. Audio volume Audio track adjustment mute split variable speed fade. UverVideo Pro Unlimited Subscription You can subscribe for unlimited access to all features and content offered for purchase within UverVideo. The membership subscription fee depends on the subscription plan you choose and is charged monthly or yearly. In addition a one time payment will be offered if needed this is not a subscription . Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase. If eligible for free trial and you subscribe before your free trial ends the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed. Subscriptions will start immediately after free trial ends unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the trial period. Special reminder: If your subscription plan is monthly or yearly you can make up the difference and upgrade to a one time payment plan this is not a subscription .
